| History                 = Hero Insider News was a media outlet focused on the superhero community. One of their reporters was present at a press conference held by [[Stark Unlimited (Earth-616)|Stark Unlimited]] after [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] aveted an attack by a mind-controlled [[Fin Fang Foom (Earth-616)|Fin Fang Foom]]. The reporter asked Tony Stark if his status quo as Iron Man was going to revolve around using armor of different sizes, since that is how he had tackled Fin Fang Foom.{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 1}}
